titleStmt.title: England's delight in this Parliament exprest in a reasonable acrostick-petition to the King's Most Excellent Majesty : with reflections upon the happy reign of Queen Elisabeth, that absolute and prime opposer of popery.
titleStmt.author: Sambach, William.
